attributes.action: Full lockdown, essential shops need to be closed, no one allows leave home
attributes.additional_details: If we don't have a proper Full lockdown now then the virus will be spread more as its already out of control now, we lost too many lifes already so the government needs to do something Now rather than later. Look at the Asia country such as Korean, and China, Hong Kong, and Japan, and they all have the full lockdown and virus can control. Even needs people to wear face masks soon they leave the house, not like here only wear face masks at in door, but not all the people wear them anyway
attributes.background: I think we never have a lockdown since March, people can still go out doing exercises, supermarket etc. We should have a FULL Lockdown such as every shops need to be closed even essential as if people need to stay at home then no point for the essential shops to be opened

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553580
